title: (0Day) Famatech Advanced IP Scanner Uncontrolled Search Path Element Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Famatech Advanced IP Scanner. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the application's use of Qt. The application loads Qt plugins from an unsecured location. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of an administrator.
addtionnal_details: 05/12/23 – ZDI reported the vulnerability to the vendor05/16/23 –The vendor acknowledged the receipt of the report12/01/23 – ZDI asked for updates01/10/24 –The vendor communicated that the development team was working on a fix05/16/24 – ZDI asked for updates and notified the vendor of the intention to publish the case as 0-day advisory-- Mitigation: Given the nature of the vulnerability, the only salient mitigation strategy is to restrict interaction with the application.
